   stated on April 4, 2015 in an infographic on the Addicting Info website:

(AP)

   Jon Greenberg
   By Jon Greenberg April 15, 2015

Liberal blog: U.S. cops killed more people in one month than U.K. cops killed
last century

   As the country learned about the shooting death of Walter Scott in North
   Charleston, S.C., a comparison between police in the United States and the
   United Kingdom began to spread across the Internet.

The liberal website
   Addicting Info put up a graphic under the headline "U.S. Police killed
   more people in just one month than the U.K.’s did in over a century."

Parker wrote that "U.S. police
   killed more people in one month than the U.K.’s did in an entire year."
